formattedAddress: 501 Fashion Ave, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 501 Fashion Ave, New York, NY 10018, USA

editorialSummary.text: Fast-food chain offering Mexican fare, including design-your-own burritos, tacos & bowls.

originalText.text: The chiptole shows open at 10:45 am but they don’t really have everything ready. I waited here 20 minutes and neither they had fajitas ready nor the staff was in good mood coz they were rushing everything to open and people were waiting. Their barcode system does not work so I lost my points as I clicked on it to redeem. Made me buy a larger drink because they don’t have the small available at this store. Just a nonsense owner trying to make the maximum money but unable to deliver the service. Also their lemonade juices are stingy.

originalText.text:
Kids build your own menu at Chipotle, the best deal you can get at a chain that is tasty, quick and constitutes a balanced meal at $6. Ample seating, clean, has restrooms and a good number of beverage options.

I usually get the kids menu and get the soft tortilla (part whole wheat for grains), chicken (protein), black beans (pulses), salsa (vegetables), fruit and chocolate milk. All for just $6 and great taste in under 3 minutes.

originalText.text: Everything in that bowl that day tasted fresh and good . For my first experience eating from this chain  of restaurants; I would recommend you coming to this one if you like this type of cuisine . Will be back hoping to experience the same taste .

text.text: Everything in that bowl that day tasted fresh and good . For my first experience eating from this chain  of restaurants; I would recommend you coming to this one if you like this type of cuisine . Will be back hoping to experience the same taste .

originalText.text:
I have visited this Chipotle and also the one on 8th Avenuetight before Port Authority which is not to far from this location.  Both locations the workers are nasty and don't know the first thing about customer service.  No one greets you, they take their time pushing the line out. I once had a lady take my cash and she started helping other customers while holding my money. It took me to say, may I have my change after she helped 2 people. Last time I purchased a salad and had to ask for dressing. Why? Who eats plain salad? Plus, when the person came to take my money she was nasty. I never seen such miserable people.
The whole staff looked miserable which is not surprising since I know first hand how Chipotle treats their employees. My daughter was a GM for years until she got fed up with the area manager.  I used to look forward to going to Chipotle now I dread it. Have your Area Manager come down and watch how these workers take care of their customers.  Absolutely disgusting!!!

originalText.text:
Umm, it’s been so long years since I had my last meal from Chipotle. I’d say is still taste the same. Really like they’re committed as being a really tasty Mexican food , and affordable as well easy access! This is how to say a success.

The only thing I was disappointing with was they do not serve Quesadillas any more for local orders
